title: Breaking Through (CRS047)
description:
In his early 20s, Kevin falls in love with a close friend who doesn’t feel the same way for years. On Fire Island, on ecstasy and ketamine, Kevin has a hallucination that helps him finally get over the crush.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK
